title: RedLed Digital Watch Face
summary: Simple, digital, with red led retro display design. Perfect for any wearable.
description: Retro led screen like watch face. It's prepared to look well on any shape of screen.Default settings display:- Normal & ambient mode- Current hour & minute values (visible in ambient mode)- Current day (hidden in ambient mode)- Battery level in four states - 3 blocks above 80%, 2 blocks above 40%, 1 block above 15% and 0 block for lower values (hidden in ambient mode)- Blinking colon symbol (like in old digital watches) seconds indicator (it's not blinking in ambient mode)Future versions will allow customize your watch face.
descriptionHTML:
Retro led screen like watch face. It's prepared to look well on any shape of screen.

Default settings display:
- Normal & ambient mode
- Current hour & minute values (visible in ambient mode)
- Current day (hidden in ambient mode)
- Battery level in four states - 3 blocks above 80%, 2 blocks above 40%, 1 block above 15% and 0 block for lower values (hidden in ambient mode)
- Blinking colon symbol (like in old digital watches) seconds indicator (it's not blinking in ambient mode)

Future versions will allow customize your watch face.
comments: Don't know if this is something I'm doing wrong or not.  I downloaded this and loved it, then I had to reset my watch to factory settings and lost it.  Now it won't let me download it again, because it claims I've already done it.  Is there a way to get it back?
No 12.hour mode How do I change to the 12 hour mode? In the Play Store the pics show 12.hour format, but when downloaded on my watch, it shows 24.
It's okay. The background red could be dialed down a bit, and the ambient mode isn't that pretty.
